page.title: 06 Churches in Woodford Halse.
page.content: There are 4 churches in Woodford Halse. St. Mary's Church is the established Church of England and the vicar is the Rev.Timothy Rawdon-Mogg. There are Roman Catholic and Methodist churches in Hinton.There is a Moravian church in Parsons St.The Minister is the Rev.Mrs. M.Grubb.It was built in 1796. The Moravian Church was founded by John Huss who broke with the Roman Catholics.For this he was burned at the stake in 1415.Some of his friends fled and founded their own church in 1457 at Kunwald on the borders of Moravia and Silesia.Further persecution came in the C16th.In 1724 Count von Zinzendorf let them settle on his Estate and build a town called Herrnhut nr. Diesden. From there they sent missionaries all over the world.The first Moravian immigrants settled in America in 1735.
